name: Quench A Candle
description:
👓Oculus Quest VR Game with Hand Tracking 👋

🕹️ Come and join the first arcade game* of the viking era! How many candles can you quench before the Thawpocalypse? 🔥

*Requires Oculus Quest with Hand Tracking enabled

🕯️ How to Quench
  • 🤏Pinch your index and thumb fingers to interact with the game!
  • 🧯 Quench as many candles as you can before the Great Thawing.
  • 💪 Brag about your unburnt skin and flawless score with your techno viking pals
📯 Oculus Quest VR Game for 2020 Unreal Spring Jam 

Modifier categories for this entry:

  • 🐣Army of one (solo developer)
  • 💾 Tiny award (game is less than 100MB)
  • 🌱Is this real life? (XR game)

Team: Gabriel Ramos @toddsdk
